item.title: Moving Axis Labels in ggplot2
item.description: A wee while ago I needed to tweak some plots. The plots are exported as jpegs and are always results over the last ten years. The change I needed to make was to move the default labels produced by ggplot2. To demonstrate, letâ€™s look at an example by reducing the economics dataset to 10 years of data and producing a quick plot. library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) # reduce the data data_to_plot <- filter(economics, between(date, as.
